scripts.dev: npm run frontend:serve & npm run backend:run
scripts.backend:lint: dotnet format --verify-no-changes --verbosity diagnostic backend || dotnet format backend
scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.test: npm run frontend:test && npm run backend:test
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build:prod && npm run backend:build
scripts.clean: npm run frontend:clean 2>/dev/null; dotnet clean backend 2>/dev/null; exit 0
